Description.Text: Sapphire City Hotel is a luxury 5-star property offering stylish accommodation in the heart of Baku. Highlights include a gym, free Wi-Fi and a good location near Maiden's Tower. Baku is a thriving, cosmopolitan city with extremely diverse architecture, from sleek, modern towers to an Old City core (recognised as a UNESCO World Heritage Site) featuring a maze of narrow alleys, cobbled streets and ancient buildings. Places of interest include Maiden's Tower, Palace of the Shirvanshahs, the National Museum of History and Martyrs' Lane. Sahil metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Baku destinations. The hotel is housed in an elegant mid-rise building. Facilities include a gym, and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Business rooms are approximately 30sqm and decorated in a traditional style with wood furniture, carpeted floors and high ceilings. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, safe and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. La Fontaine serves Azerbaijani specialities and international cuisine in a charming setting. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the bar, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
